data.title: Railways Training Institutes and Manufacturing Units
data.meta_description: General knowledge on training institutes, manufacturing units and luxury train routes of Indian Railways for competitive exams.
data.text: 1. National Academy of Indian Railways (Railway Staff College)Vadodara 2. Indian Railway Institute of Civil EngineeringPune 3. Indian Railway Institute of Signal Engineering and TelecommunicationsSecunderabad 4. Indian Railway Institute of Mechanical and Electrical EngineeringJamalpur 5. Indian Railway Institute of Electrical EngineeringNasik 6. Indian Railway Institute of Transport ManagementLucknow
